page_1.title: Game description
page_1.content: The game is played in 12 rounds in which the dice fall anew each time. All see the same result and always tries to find the best scoring category for him. Each category is available only once per game! The player with the highest total score in the end wins the Dice Cup!

page_2.title: Game play
page_2.content: After the countdown, the dice that you should remember well are shown for only 3 seconds. Now they are covered again and the selection of the categories begins. Here you have to weigh up which categories which brings you the most points. But remember, you can only choose these once per game! Then the dice are counted and the points awarded.

page_3.title: Game valuation
page_3.content:
The sum of each dice number.
The sum of each dice color.
Doubles with same color give 10 points.
The sum of all dice showing 1 2 3.
The sum of all dice.
